mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectEvtNmbrApplcn Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ EVT_PARTCPTN_SN , NMBR_NM , NMBR_MOBIL_NO , DEVICE_ID , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM EVT_NMBR_APPLCN WHERE 1 = 1 AND EVT_PARTCPTN_SN = #{evtPartcptnSn,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.delete: DELETE /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.deleteEvtNmbrApplcn Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ FROM EVT_NMBR_APPLCN WHERE 1 = 1 AND EVT_PARTCPTN_SN = #{evtPartcptnSn,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
